blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

blog.name: ubernegro
blog.title: The meanderings of clinically depressed black male
blog.description: Hello, this blog was generally about comic books and still is, but I lost the ability to scan my comics so instead of misadvertising and misleading. This is just a normal blog where I just detail my interests and ocasionally rant about comics, films, or media like normal people. I am also clinically depressed and been asked to commit to a hospital, but it's Florida and they want to dope me up with enough drugs so I can't feel aything without my permission if I do commit myself. I rather be in pain than numb to feeling things. Anyways, off on that bleak and dark point, welcome and enjoy.

blog.name: ebonyheartnet
blog.title: Let there be random!
blog.description:
*waves in plz ask before tagging in things*

My Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/R5R2LV4N

Here to drop off Cryptic Comments, but the short and long of it is that this blog follows the paradox of tolerance: You are welcome so long as you remember that having an asshole doesn’t mean you have to be one.

body:
Spider-Man might be a misnomer,

because he could’ve just been bitten by a regular ass toddler and the spider just made the kid’s abilities transfer to scale.

Receipts:

  • Sticky hands and feet to climb shit that he definitely should not be able to by laws of the universe and other people’s anxiety
  • Ability to make and catch tons of crap with more sticky shit that gets fucking everywhere, although it’s nice that at least his dissolves completely in a few hours becAUSE CHILDREN ARE NOT COURTEOUS ENOUGH FOR THAT TO BE THE CASE
  • Danger sense that helps him dodge whenever something he won’t like is about to happen, like a person removing an article of clothing he does not see the need to remove, being picked up when he doesn’t wish to be, bad food, etc.
  • HE IS STRONGER THAN HE LOOKS OH MY GOD THAT KICK HURT
  • Very bad at lying (that’s not a super power but it’s a similarity because damn)
  • Clumsy AND acrobatic, but not always when you would expect
  • Crashes into all kinds of shit and walks it off, all while nearly giving everyone else a fucking stronk
  • When he can’t really walk off an injury or something, he still heals really damn fast, and again with the heart attacks because you should be resting why are you running around oh my god
  • So. Fucking. Fast.

Unless the toddler was already into gymnastics, the only thing that he got from the spider was balance, okay?

…

Actually, while I have never seen a small child who can balance on anything ever for more than 30 seconds without nearly falling over while running, I have seen more than one sleep literally on the only inch of their toddler bed WITHOUT a railing, and somehow not fall the fuck off.

…

I was kidding originally, but uh…

Huh.

Edit: Check the notes you cowards

blog.name: usually-its-just-subtext
blog.title: usually-its-just-subtext
blog.description: Ummm so I'm in too many fandoms and this is the result

tags: i may be a little annoyed
summary: Okay so Peter Parker and Dr Strange alright
body:
Okay so Peter Parker and Dr Strange alright

I see all these posts and fan art and such portraying Peter as this super goofy kid when he’s with Dr. Strange and you know I’m for it sometimes but other times like right now I’m not.

Peter Parker is a science nerd!

Do NOT come here and tell me that as soon as he found out that Doctor Fucking Stephen Strange was an actual Doctor with his PhD and shit he did not geek out just a little

Or a lot.

Dr. Strange has done some pretty cool surgeries during his career and I fully believe that Peter Parker would be fascinated.

He would be asking questions about all sorts of things involved that he’s always wondered about. He would be a science nerd. That’s what he is. Let my baby be a nerd and geek out.

Don’t make him out to be a dummy.

Sure he is a meme king.

Sure he is a teenager and goofs around a lot.

But he is no dummy!

He didn’t fucking die for this shit

tags: read the whole thing cause the picture is misleading lmao
summary: i’m tired of waking up every day and doing the same fucking routine 😭😭😭 tired of school and a messed up sleeping schedule and...
body:
i’m tired of waking up every day and doing the same fucking routine 😭😭😭 tired of school and a messed up sleeping schedule and way too much homework. but then i remember Peter Parker is also a student juggling being a superhero and sophomore year (like me minus the hero part) and i got inspired

reblog with your story and your inspiration

blog.name: ireallyhategrapes
blog.description: university student, spending my life watching movies

summary:
Dad: wanna know why Spider-Man is an idiot? *sends video*
Me, an intellectual watching memes all day: dad.... you have to be on...
body:
Dad: wanna know why Spider-Man is an idiot? *sends video*

Me, an intellectual watching memes all day: dad…. you have to be on a certain intellectual level to understand it… *thinks back to all the memes about Peter* he just had to yeet out

Dad: *looses faith in humanity*

reblog.comment:
